title: Healthy Hospital: Save Doge
description:
Work in Healthy Hospital and be a hospital manager who heals and saves people and puppies. You can manage the medical staff and build your medical center in the game.

Arrange beds and manage doctors in corresponding departments to diagnose and treat patients. Here, you will cure more and more patients and contribute to the medical cause of the world.

Game Features:
- Play the Mini-game and save the unusual patient: The patient gets bited and needs treatment. 
- Build the hospital: You will allocate medical resources and expand the department. Hospitals with different geographical characteristics are to be established.
- Upgrade equipment: How to save the suffering people? Develop more devices to help various patients regain their health. What if there are more and more patients? Upgrade hospital equipment to treat them efficiently.
- Challenging levels: There are hundreds of levels, each with varying difficulty and features. You need to come up with a strategy to pass the level. Complete challenges, and there will be more surprises.
- Well-crafted content: The background music is relaxing and enjoyable. The graphics are also well designed. 

Plan your strategy and become the best in this hospital simulation game by building and managing your hospital to create the most efficient health center in the world!

summary: Manage your medical center and run your dream hospital! Play hospital game!
